music.title: OUR MUSIC
music.description: Electric guitar fused with traditional oud, acoustic guitar married to banjo! A unique soundscape that travels from desert to mountains. Instrumental music composed in Montpellier - perfect as background music in restaurants or explosive on stage with rock sounds!
music.imageAlt: World music duo live Montpellier oud guitar banjo concert

booking.title: FOR WHOM?
booking.description: World music festival, private concert, bohemian wedding, corporate event, restaurant or private individual - our musical platform will seduce you! Discover our unique sound universe blending world, arabesque, western, folk and blues.
booking.imageAlt: Private concert Montpellier wedding corporate event live band

story.title: BASED IN MONTPELLIER
story.locationText: Professional musical duo based in Montpellier in H√©rault. We perform for your events throughout Occitanie: Montpellier, N√Æmes, B√©ziers, S√®te, Toulouse, Perpignan and surroundings.
story.storyText: Two musician neighbors who became friends, sharing games, beers and laughter! Music came naturally. Seeking a unique sound born from their opposite musical horizons, they explore rhythms, scales, silences and tensions. On stage, pleasure comes first! üíõ
